    • basic

      public static Application<Request,​Response> basic​(int port, Router<Request,​Response> router) throws java.io.IOException
      Instantiates a basic Application, with support for basic Requests and Responses.
      Parameters:
      port - port to bind to the Http server
      router - router of the application
      Returns:
      the instantiated Application
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - on port binding failure
